pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust Estimation of Probit Models with Endogeneity // Package provides a set of tools for robust estimation and inference for probit model with endogenous covariates. The current version contains a robust two-step estimator. For technical details, see Naghi, Varadi and Zhelonkin (2022), doi:10.1016/j.ecosta.2022.05.001.
